title: Hiring | IFF is looking for a Digital Literacy Intern
selftext:
https://preview.redd.it/sg44tbhc270b1.png?width=1600&format=png&auto=webp&v=enabled&s=437212d72dee12d31ce6c83e6da53a7a05bc9e91

Do you want to join India’s No.1 Producer of Memes on Digital Rights?  
We’re hiring! IFF is looking for a Digital Literacy intern to join our communications team! Applicants will be reviewed on a rolling basis.  
Apply here   
[https://forms.internetfreedom.in/survey/p/749e4f89-0a7e-4385-84ea-9d85f7329e38/r/o](https://forms.internetfreedom.in/survey/p/749e4f89-0a7e-4385-84ea-9d85f7329e38/r/o) 

Help shape communications for a digital rights organisation working on the cutting edge of issues like surveillance, censorship, & net neutrality. You can find the complete job description here   
[https://drive.google.com/file/d/14-PLUXzlNaAjCVynY4dga4blD-fcJO\_M/view?usp=sharing](https://drive.google.com/file/d/14-PLUXzlNaAjCVynY4dga4blD-fcJO_M/view?usp=sharing)

This position will be full-time, based out of IFF's office in New Delhi. Interns will receive a stipend of INR 10,000 per month.
